description: Premium bot with tons of features

SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here or get session id from here, https://oreki-sessions.onrender.com

AUTHOR.description: Specify the Sticker Pack author name.

MODE.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox or groups in small letters (e.g, public)

ANTI_LINK.description: Bot delete or kick links sender from group, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

COUNTRY_BLOCK.description: Block by country code true to Enable, false to disable (e.g, true)

COUNTRY_BLOCK_CODE.description: Block by country code put country code without + (e.g, 972)

PREMIUM_USERS.description: There are some commands which can only be used by the premium users, put premium users number without +, multiple numbers can be seperated by comma (,) (e.g, 923072380xxx, or 923072380xx,9234538003xx)
